mapper.sql: id, user_id, config_type, config_key, config_value, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT FROM im_user_config WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND config_type = #{configType} AND config_key = #{configKey} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO im_user_config (user_id, config_type, config_key, config_value, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{configType}, #{configKey}, #{configValue}, NOW(), NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE config_value = #{configValue}, update_time = NOW()
